column2: ENGLISH

Honoured [From.GetTitledName], I dislike having to request this from you, but your favor to me shall be payed back graciously by a generous donation for our realm.

Signed,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
Here is the requested amount.
I don't think I want to do that.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] will not appreciate your refusal.\n
I will be pleased to offer you more!
This is too much money! Fewer coins are enough!
Sorry, but you would understand that, at this time...

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName], here are the [From.local_Keitaro_money_count_spent.GetValue]¤ that you have asked, I hope this settles everything.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Good.

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I am afraid I have to decline your offer, my money is too important for that.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
How dare you!

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I felt obliged to give you more than what you have asked for, I am convinced that you will use this donation with good intentions. Here are [From.local_Keitaro_money_count_spent.GetValue]¤.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Perfect!

Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I'm sure the amount of [From.local_Keitaro_money_count_spent.GetValue]¤ I sent you is enough, It wouldn't feel right to dispossess the wealth of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
What ?!

To the dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], as much as I would like to comply with your request, I am afraid that this could compromise the well-being of the good people of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and I'm sure we can find a better arrangement for the favor I owe you.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I'm convinced by this argument, that wasn't right of me to request this.

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It is most unfortunate that you happen to hold the [title.GetFullBaseName] that all agree should rightfully be mine. No words could describe my gratefulness, would you take this decision.

Signed,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
Of course!
Not yet.

To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

Your loyalty shall be gracely rewarded with the [title.GetFullBaseName]. May you honor your house with prestige and prosperity.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
[From.GetTitledFirstName] made the right decision!

To the [GetFromRootCompliment], [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

It pains me that I can't comply with your desire. I hope fortune will come to you in the future.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
This is unfortunate.
